title: Matrix Factorization for Recommendations
subtitle: Uncover hidden patterns in user behavior
contentHtml: In this example, we'll apply matrix factorization to build a recommendation system.
problemHtml: Given a user-item interaction matrix R ∈ ℝ^(m×n), where m is the number of users and n is the number of items, find a low-rank approximation using non-negative matrix factorization (NMF).
